description: woman and man on left and right side of image separated by three long, thick bands meant to depict the sun's rays radiating from the top of the image
inscription: LLC in plate: P.W.G. 19. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: W. Gramatté. Die fernen Geliebten / Dr. Rauert / 578 E.132 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 8- | LL margin of sheet in pencil, on verso: Die fernen Geliebten
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Gramatté / 19
title: The Distant Lovers
